shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a user joins a channel.

section.p: This callback notifies the application that a user joins a specified channel when the application calls the"joinChannel" method.

plentry.pd: The channel name. This parameter is assigned based on the channel name specified when calling to join the channel.
User ID This parameter is assigned based on the user ID specified when joining the channel. If the user ID is not specified when joining the channel, the Agora server will automatically assign an ID.
The elapsed time (in milliseconds) from the start of the local call to the occurrence of this event.
